channel.title: FWGO Open Source V1
channel.description:
For those of you who go into the General Programming Section or General Discussion section you probably know who I am. Well I am releasing a new type of online game for people to learn from or to shoot the hell out of their friends. FWGO or Fellas With Guns Online is an online TDS (Top Down Shooter). There are many different types of weapons such as the AUG, M14A1, MP5K, Snipers, Desert Eagles and more. I have been developing this now for about 3 weeks or so and it is coming along beautifully. I know that as of the moment it is a little bare looks wise, but the gameplay is awesome and fast paced. This is version 1, but there will be many more versions to come. I am already adding Zombie mode, ranks, player shops, new weapons, maps and more. I hope you all can use this.
Thanks, GML Programmer
[b]V1 Download: http://up.ht/mE9Ek7[/b]
Included Files: A ready to go server and client An editable server and client Game Maker 8.0 Pro 2 Read Me's for instructions Proper 39dll.dlls for online gameplay
[b]Youtube Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=00Tbb0y-zTY[/b]
Images: [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot101-2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot100-2.png[/img]

item.title: FWGO Open Source V1
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

hey guys i knew it was a joke. its ok. i know im legit so it doesnt really matter what others think. besides i know some antivirusrs will pick up the server program as a virus. my cousins [one of the other developers on this project] does. but thats because of his firewall settings. its very common for server programs to trip up antiviruses so im not offended at all. its understandable

Read full topic

item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:18, topic:400053”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=497149.msg3635498#msg3635498 date=1308576869]

virus

Proof or gtfo. GML is legitimate so you better be able to back up that accusation.

I lol’d.

Casey has probably been here longer than you have been alive

So that means that he can make any accusation he wants without any proof?
[/quote]

Your stupid.
He was making a joke, because 90% of the idiots on this site claim everything is a virus.[/quote]

I guess I am stupid because I don’t know a single person in an online community of 200+ people. Shame on me. Shame.

Read full topic
